description: Endive leaves make the perfect vessel for creamy blue cheese, dates and walnuts.
keywords: Cold canap√©s,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free
name: Endive Leaves with Blue Cheese & Walnut Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the outer leaves of each head of endive and arrange the smaller leaves on a serving platter.
In a medium bowl, mix the gorgonzola, chopped dates, chives and two thirds of the walnuts to form a coarse paste.
Scoop a teaspoon of the gorgonzola mix into each leaf and top with a sprinkling of walnuts. Serve on a round platter, arranged in a circular pattern.
